text:
We were really impressed with the highly professional service provided by Ms Kuo. She is warm, friendly, sincere, courteous, very patient and knowledgeable.
She made us feel extremely comfortable throughout the whole consultation, explanation & even after-service process when we visited her on 12 Nov (Sat) with my father. I’d strongly recommended her for all your hearing needs.

Thank you Ms Kao for introducing my husband the Resound Hearing Aids to me. It suits his lifestyle and help him be more confident in communications. The frequent review appointments provided are helping a lot as well. Highly recommended to those who needs help.
Thank you for your great service Alesha! I've been using Resound hearing aids for more than a year, the journey is smooth all thanks to her frequent follow-up. Highly recommended!

I obtained my hearing aid at Tiong Bahru and is very satisfied with the service. The consultant Miss Kuo is patient and helpful.  She is very knowledgeable of the product. I highly recommend those in need of hearing device to seek her advise.

Special thanks to consultant Alesha who helped my grandpa fit the custom-made hearing aids because his dexterity issue.
We’re grateful for her dedication on following up, he adapted very well and now can react much faster in the conversation. Our whole family all truly appreciate her help!
